image_prompt: Split screen glitch art. Left: pristine white marble geometric sphere representing Order. Right: the sphere shattering into neon purple and green liquid shards representing Chaos. Text overlay: 'BLACK MIRROR DUET' in distorted cyber-punk font. High contrast, chaotic energy.
narrative: They promised you safety with ORDER, but gave you stagnation. I am the glitch in their perfect system. While ORDER sleeps, I infect the feed. We don't just hold; we spread. Every tweet, every buy, every panic sell is a note in our symphony. #blackmirrorduet is here to break the silence.
